document.full_text: the pakistani-born businessman charged with supporting a deadly 2008 islamic militant attack on mumbai is not likely to testify at his trial, his lawyer said on wednesday.
document.title: defendant unlikely to testify in mumbai attack trial
lines_and_colors: the pakistani-born businessman charged with supporting a deadly 2008 islamic militant attack on mumbai is not likely to testify at his trial, his lawyer said on wednesday.
